description: Baseline performance metrics for runner benchmarks. These values represent expected minimum performance thresholds.

DiskIO.description: Disk I/O baseline - minimum acceptable speeds for CI/CD workloads

Network.description: Network baseline - maximum acceptable latency and minimum download speed

DotNet.description: .NET baseline - maximum acceptable build time for simple console app

Python.description: Python baseline - maximum acceptable startup and execution times

Git.description: Git baseline - maximum acceptable times for common operations

notes: Baselines are intentionally conservative to ensure broad compatibility
Performance ratings help identify optimization opportunities
Update baselines periodically based on infrastructure improvements
Failed tests (-1 values) should be investigated separately
